thread.title: Paul Amstislavski
thread.title_full: VON FLOERKE bewertet von Paul Amstislavski

author: Paul Amstislavski
title: Paul Amstislavski
text: I have purchased several items from Von Floerke, including a watch and socks. Customer service and delivery was always excellent and super fast. The articles were of great color and quality. I always recommend my friends to buy from Von Floerke when they look for Men's Accessories!
